modName: Runic Eyes for Ningheim Compatibility Patch
summary: Patches innova889's Runic Eyes for Ningheim support.
descriptionHtml:
A replacement .esp file which simply changes the mesh used in Runic Eyes to the Ningheim eye mesh.

[s]Due to the way I have done this it renders the mod unusable on any other race, I will fix this later if I find the time. There may also be some eyes coloured completely black, I'm not sure what causes this.[/s]

[u]Version 1.3
[/u]Now works with Runic v8

[u]Version 1.2[/u]
Now works with Runic v5

[u]Version 1.1[/u]
Updated to allow the eyes to be used in other races, however it adds duplicates to the Ningheim race menu. I am unsure how to avoid that. It should also replace the Ningheim vampire eyes.

Requires [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474/]The Ningheim Race[/url] and [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43899/]Runic Eyes[/url], naturally.

Installation:
Just replace the esp with the one included in the rar. Load after the Ningheim plugin.

I did very little work compared to those above. If you want to copy, improve and re-release this, ask them, not me.

Credits:
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43899/]Runic Eyes by innova889[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474/]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX [/url](best mod ever)

All the real work was done by innova889, SerenXX4 and LogRaam. Use my esp if you wish but if you re-release it (hopefully as a better version), give props to these heroes.

I didn't intend to release this myself, sorry if I have committed a faux pas in my etiquette.
author: Thorsmjolnir
